title: HELP
body: I go start game type in username and password and a red error message comes up and saying something went wrong and to contact riot support so I did all the recommended steps to solve issue and it still remains does anyone know how to fix this problem?

replies.body: I also tried to to the repatch on hextech tool as well as restart client and still didn't work

This is an issue we've been tracking in our[ current sticky ](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/Oe3XBf34-incorrect-username-or-password)thread, and seems to be caused by a patch mismatch.  Restarting your client should help, or this alternative:

- Locate LeagueClientSettings.yaml within C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
- Open it with a text editor (such as Notepad, TextEdit, or Notepad++) and find gameflow-patcher-lock. It should have a number there.
- Change the number to read "null" (without quotes)
- Save the file.
- Restart the client.

Let me know if that works for you!
it already says "null" (without quotes) is the gameflow-patcher-lock section
